name: CVE-2024-6387-OpenSSH-ProxyCommand-RC
description: This repository contains a proof-of-concept (PoC) for exploiting the OpenSSH ProxyCommand vulnerability — CVE-2024-6387 — affecting OpenSSH servers with poorly secured or misused ProxyCommand configurations.  The exploit demonstrates how an attacker can abuse ProxyCommand injection to gain command execution or lateral access, depending on the setup
